title: May the 4th: Apple teases special ‘Behind the Mac: Skywalker Sound’ video
content:
May the 4th is coming, and as you may know, it’s an important date for Star Wars fans. This is why Apple is teasing a new Behind the Mac video with the artists from the Skywalker Sound company, which is set to be released a few days from now.

more…

The post May the 4th: Apple teases special ‘Behind the Mac: Skywalker Sound’ video appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: May the 4th is coming, and it's an important date for Star Wars fans. This is why Apple is teasing a new Behind the Mac video.
